body_html: What kind of test would have caught this? Building c10d can still be conditional when building libtorch. If I read the path you commented on in that PR it looks like it was just conditional on BUILD_PYTHON there.
body_text: What kind of test would have caught this? Building c10d can still be conditional when building libtorch. If I read the path you commented on in that PR it looks like it was just conditional on BUILD_PYTHON there.
body: What kind of test would have caught this? Building c10d can still be conditional when building libtorch. If I read the path you commented on in that PR it looks like it was just conditional on `BUILD_PYTHON` there.
